entry.title: What is machine learning?
entry.content:
Without having to write any custom code to specific problem. Just feed data to the generic algorithm and it builds its own logical base on the data.

For instance, there is a kind of algorithm named classification. You can feed handwritten letters to the generic algorithm, then it can put data into different groups, here are letters. Also we could feed the generic algorithm with spam or - not-spam emails, then it will put them into two groups: spam and not-spam.

“Machine Learning” includes different kinds of generic algorithms like classification algorithm. It can split into two main categories - supervised learning and unsupervised learning.
entry.summary: Without having to write any custom code to specific problem. Just

entry.title: Ten years
entry.content:
I have left my university for ten years. And my university happend to sixty years anniversary this year. And today happen to 10,oct. It’s really wonderful.

When I looked back my ten years, tons of stories spring to my mind. Thanks for fullfiling four years days in my college life. It help me get out of the shadow of the forth high schools life. But from today’s view I found these black high school experiences let me know what is bad feeling and what’s difficulty like. And They also reminded me to think about next steps how to live with myself.

Not only wonderful moments, but also difficult times, hard lifes , they are all my great wealth and especially the bad feelings and un-willing things let me learn to know myself and listen to my heart. What’s my life will be in the future? What’s I have to do, to master so I can earn enough money to survive in city.

I know we could grow up more quickly and strongly by ourself to face difficulty and to fix them. As someone said try and experience is one kind of accumulation. So don’t hesitate to try, to practice to become the best of yourself.

Stand the next ten years port, I know what I want to do, I know how to finish it. Open my shoulder to welcome the next ten years. Have a big dream and dream it! Just to try , to practice, to acumulate and review!
entry.summary: I have left my university for ten years

entry.title: Future
entry.content:
With the technology develop and humankind advance, Harari the author of -A brief history of humankind- think only there types of humankinds will be in the world. The first is useless people, the second is no self-determination people, and the last one is God people.

Modern biology let us know organism are combine with algorithms. And the God people will be responsible to research, make great algorithms to make the world run more efficient. They will effectivity control the useless and no self-determination people finally.

Because to the public people, algorithms( you can think them as AI) will know better than yourself and can make more valuable decision for you. It do really give me a shock when I hear about these thoughts. In the end, most of us will be the slavers of the algorithms, the God people. It’s definitely impossible to image the world in this way.

But it seems like human tend to choose the easiest way to live. So if the algorithms could help us live better why we don’t accept it. Maybe we’ll be happy with this in many many many years later.
entry.summary: With the technology develop and humankind advance,

entry.title: Weaknesses
entry.content:
Everyone has some weaknesses. The interviewer always let us to talk about our weaknesses. It’s really more difficulty to describe it than to talk about your positive qualities.
But when we talk about our weaknesses with interviewer you’d better to choose one of them and not to be stupid honest.

We should let the interviewer to know we do have some weaknesses but you can emphasize these don’t affect your work. For instance, you will easily get down when things don’t go your way. But you can say: I would never shirk from the responsibilities and completely give 100% effort on my work.

Weaknesses are not often bad things for your job position, most of time you need find the suitable job for yourself. In the mean time, we are living in a highly competitive world, the most import part is keep to push yourself to build your core skills to make them more powerful.
entry.summary: Everyone has some weaknesses. The interviewer always let us

entry.title: Insanely Simple
entry.content:
This book written by Ken Gegall let me know more about the key value of Apple’s product : Not simple but insanely simple which is the first principle for Steve jobs. It’s not only a principle for a product , but also the key rule for everything for Steve jobs. Including product, design, meeting, decision, marketing, creative, advertisement, organization, communication etc. Oh, my god, when I read this book, It do definitely give me a great shock. I have remembered professor Li Shantou has said
Steve jobs think pattern base on two very simple rules. The first is this one, and the second is Humanity.

Insanely Simple has helped apple get out of decline and created very successful and most popular electrical products over the world including iPod, iPhone, iPad. All these products were revolutionary at their periods.

If we want to make amazing & fantastic products, we should take Insanely Simple as our the first principle thinking and action rule. And must say No to Good. Because good is not good enough. User need amazing.
entry.summary: This book written by Ke

entry.title: Why leave?
entry.content:
Leave previous firm is very common for us. But it’s definitely important to tell the reason of your leaving in a smart way.

When we encounter this situation, we maybe say previous company didn’t offer much
challenge or not much prospects for the future. Of course, many of us want to earn more money by changing a new job or new position. In general speaking, previous company help us build skills and we have got used the job. We need to more salary because we’re more valuable in job market.To be honest,
sometime it didn’t like this. Indeed, some of people did’t like their job and they always change jobs without skilling improved.
Maybe some guys will say previous job is not suitable for their career in long-term. This is why they can’t stay for a long time.
In short, interviewer want to know as more as they can to make sure that you are suitable for the job position. And we should finish your work perfectly to improve our skills.
entry.summary: Leave previous firm is very common for us. But i

entry.title: Change
entry.content:
No change, No chance! It’s very hard to say good bye to the old styles, but If it do really help users to make a better life, better work. Why we don’t to have a try. Each change is impossible to let every users like it, even love it. But we still believe that we should make our best effort to let old guys to get used it in seconds.
Maybe it need a little bit time to suit the new circumstance, we must try our best to make it easier and more intuitive to use.

Simple & Intuitive & Powerful!

entry.title: bless
entry.content: Foreigner will always say “Bless you” after someone sneeze or cough. It’s mean that god bless you. Why do they say it? It’s started from hundreds of years ago. There was a plague in Europe which caused million of people to dead. It’s also called The Black Death. If people got a plague, they will often sneeze or cough. And it’s extremely terrible disease when people infected by this plague. So people always said “God bless you” to pray and wished god can protect them from death.
entry.summary: Foreigner will always say “Bless yo
